name: Suman Garments
overview:
Established in the year 1987, we, “Suman Garments”, are among the eminent manufacturer and supplier of Kids Wears, Children Denim Suits, Children Clothings, Kids Sherwani Suits, Kids Party Wear Dresses and Kids Jeans & T-Shirts.

Our Products?: Our assortment consists of Boys Shirts, Designer Kids Wears, Designer Kids Clothes, Kids Clothes and Kids Fashion Dresses. In addition to this, we offer Kids Designer Clothes, Kids Casual Wears, Stylish Kids Shirts, Kids Casual Wear Clothes and many more.

Our Team: We are supported by a team of professionals, which executes all the business operations in a streamlined manner. Our team of designers is creative and experienced in their respective domains. ] Our Quality: Since establishment, our main aim is to offer a quality range of Kids Wears, Children Denim Suits, Children Clothing, Kids Sherwani Suits, Kids Party Wear Dresses and Kids Jeans & T-Shirts to the patrons.

Our Infrastructure: We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility at Ahmedabad, Gujarat, which spreads over a large area. The unit is partitioned into different sections that enable us to smoothly execute all the business operations. These sections include manufacturing, quality control, warehousing & packaging and administrative.

Warehousing and Packaging: Our state-of-the-art warehousing unit is embedded with all the necessary facilities. The unit is installed with latest machinery and tools, which helps in easy loading and unloading of the products. All the products are placed in different segments for easy retrieval at the time of emergency. Furthermore, we regularly do pest and rodent control in order to avoid spoilage of the products. In order to keep the unit dust free regular cleaning is done.
